general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations according to the weather conditions. It is recommended to protect crops and animals from the cold weather. Complete sowing of Rabi crops and start nursery sowing of Summer Paddy where possible irrigation facilities exist.

advisory: Wait for some days for harvesting operations due to expected rainfall
Use 'Super Grain Bag' or proper storage methods for harvested paddy/rice
Start field preparation for summer rice cultivation
Consider using improved rice varieties for cultivation
Regular monitoring for sucking insect attack
Use neem-based insecticides for control after initial observation
Delay irrigation and spraying operations due to expected rainfall
Use straw as mulching material to maintain soil moisture and temperature
Monitor and use pheromone traps for Diamond back moth in cauliflower
Apply neem oil or Emamectin Benzoate after rain if attack is observed
Provide protection and proper care for animals from cold weather
Ensure clean drinking water for cattle and maintain clean sheds
Implement vaccination and deworming to control diseases
Ensure proper ventilation and removal of gases in poultry houses
Maintain suitable temperature in drinking water for poultry
Use insulation materials to keep poultry sheds warm and dry
